Description: Absolute position with reference to the encoderrange.This value corresponds to the modulo position ofthe absolute encoder range.The value is no longer valid if the gear ratio ofmachine encoder and motor encoder is changed.A restart is required in such a case.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 301E:FhModbus 7710Profibus 7710CIP 130.1.15ModbusTCP 7710EtherCAT 301E:FhPROFINET 7710
